subject: Why cancelled
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email. I am sorry this has been frustrating.

Your reservation was cancelled because the required confirmation and payment steps were not completed in time.

For this booking type, the process is:
1) accept the terms and conditions;
2) complete payment when prompted.

If either step is missed, the reservation is cancelled automatically and cannot be reinstated.

If you would like, we can guide you through making a new reservation with current availability.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-Qr5uCli0_vnTgmd9yTjLDtIDVcusGJYyCcnC_fPmf0/edit?usp=sharing>

subject: Agreement Received
body:
Thank you, we have received your agreement to the terms and conditions for your reservation.

Next step from our side: we will process the payment and send confirmation shortly.

No further action is needed right now. If payment does not go through, we will be in touch to let you know.

subject: Alcohol Policy
body:
Dear Guests in Room Nine,

We hope you are enjoying your stay at the hostel.

This morning, our cleaning crew removed a bottle of tequila from your room. If this item belongs to you, please visit the front desk to collect it either upon checkout or when you plan to head out and intend to consume them *outside* the hostel.

Please be reminded that bringing alcohol purchased outside of the hostel into the premises is against our policy, as stated in the room rules, terms, and conditions for room booking. As a licensed property, we must regulate alcohol consumption on-site.

We kindly ask for your cooperation with this rule to ensure compliance with legal requirements. Failure to adhere to this policy will result in the discontinuation of your stay with us.

Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,

Peter Cowling

Owner

For full details, please see: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-Qr5uCli0_vnTgmd9yTjLDtIDVcusGJYyCcnC_fPmf0/edit?usp=sharing>

subject: Transportation to Hostel Brikette
body:
{{SLOT:GREETING}}

Thanks for your email.

We have detailed travel guides on our website that cover all transport options to the hostel:

   - Travel directions to the hostel <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/travel-help>
   - Arriving by ferry <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/arriving-by-ferry>

These guides include step-by-step instructions, maps, and taxi information.

We look forward to seeing you at the hostel.

{{SLOT:KNOWLEDGE_INJECTION}}

-- 
Regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Arriving before check-in time
body:
{{SLOT:GREETING}}


Thank you for reaching out to us. 


Although official check-in time begins at 2:30 pm, we are pleased to accommodate guests from 10:30 am onwards on check-in day. We kindly request that guests do not arrive before 10:30 am, so that there is sufficient time for breakfast service and checkouts. 


*Early Arrival Process*

Upon your arrival, we'll facilitate a smooth pre-check-in process. This includes verifying details from a photo ID, processing room payment (if not already done), collecting the city tax and keycard deposit, and providing you with a security band. 



*Amenities Available Before Check-In*


   - Bag Drop: A secure area for your luggage storage. 
   - Facilities: Access to bathrooms/changing areas. 
   - Connectivity: Complimentary WiFi. 
   - Information Services: Assistance through our digital assistant and dedicated staff members. 
   - Relaxation: Our bar and terrace are open for your enjoyment. 


Please note that these amenities are also available to you on the day of checkout until 3:30 pm. 



Safe travels, and we look forward to seeing you at the hostel!

{{SLOT:KNOWLEDGE_INJECTION}}

-- 
Regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/checkin-checkout>

subject: Essential - Inner Building, Opening Main Door
body:
Dear Guest,

For access to the hostel main door, follow the steps outlined below. You will need a specific code, and to know how to enter the code. Note, your keycard is only for room access.

The main door is locked overnight for security reasons. If you are part of a group, please ensure everyone in your group is familiar with the door operation to avoid potential lockouts.


Don't get Locked Out!

Read the instructions <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nbe64lX27WM88W6d8ucsfvuJU-2_PX--zQB4LEv8LjM/edit?usp=sharing>

Ask us for a demonstration


Digital Assistant

Get answers to any questions. <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance>

Answers include links to super useful guides!


Regards,

Hostel Brikette, Positano

subject: Essential - Outer buildings, Opening Main Door
body:
Dear Guest,

The main door, where the common areas are located, is locked overnight for security reasons. For access to the hostel main door, follow the steps outlined below. Note that your keycard will get you in and out of your room, so you do not need to know the code to get into the room, just if you want to get into the common areas.


Access the common areas 24hrs a day

Read the instructions <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1nbe64lX27WM88W6d8ucsfvuJU-2_PX--zQB4LEv8LjM/edit?usp=sharing>

Ask us for a demonstration


Digital Assistant

Get answers to any questions. <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance>

Answers include links to super useful guides!


Regards,

Hostel Brikette, Positano

subject: Arrival Time - Hostel Brikette, Positano
body:
{{SLOT:GREETING}}

We hope you are having a great day and all is going well.

Just touching base to check whether you will reach us before 10:30pm tonight. If you anticipate arriving later than this time, please let us know so we can provide you with detailed instructions on our late check-in process.

We eagerly await your arrival and look forward to welcoming you to our establishment.

{{SLOT:KNOWLEDGE_INJECTION}}

Best regards,

Peter Cowling

Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/checkin-checkout>

subject: Change Credit Card Details
body:
Dear Guest,

Thanks for your email.

Please insert your revised credit card details here <https://book.octorate.com/octobook/site/reservation/login.xhtml?_xrand=1266613326&codice=45111>.


We will then run the payment, sometime in the next 24hrs. 


Best regards,

Peter Cowling

Owner

subject: Out of hours check-in
body:
Dear Guest,

Please find our out of hours check-in process here: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/late-checkin>.

We look forward to seeing you at the hostel.


Best regards,

Peter Cowling

Owner

subject: Prepayment - Cancelled post 3rd Attempt
body:
Dear Guest,

We completed the final (third) prepayment attempt and it was not successful.

As a result, the reservation has now been cancelled in line with booking policy.

We have notified Hostelworld so their system can reflect the cancellation.

If you would like to book again, we can help you with current availability and the fastest payment method.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Prepayment - 1st Attempt Failed (Octorate)
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you again for choosing to stay with us.

We attempted to process the required prepayment today, but the transaction did not complete.

No action is needed immediately. We will try a second time tomorrow.

In the meantime, please check that your card is enabled for international/online payments and has sufficient available funds.

If you prefer a different card, reply and we will send a secure update link.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Prepayment - 2nd Attempt Failed
body:
Dear Guest,

Further to our earlier message, the second prepayment attempt also failed.

We will make one final attempt tomorrow. If that final attempt fails, the reservation will be cancelled automatically according to policy.

Please update payment details as soon as possible if needed, and ensure your card can accept international/online charges.

If your booking was made through Hostelworld, any deposit refund questions must be handled directly with Hostelworld.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Prepayment - 1st Attempt Failed (Hostelworld)
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your reservation.

Our first prepayment attempt was not successful.

Under Hostelworld policy, we will make up to three payment attempts before a reservation is cancelled.

We will try again tomorrow. Please confirm your payment method is active for international/online charges.

If you want to use a different card, reply and we will send a secure link.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Cancellation of Non-Refundable Booking
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for contacting us, and I am sorry for the circumstances behind your request.

We can process the cancellation immediately if you would like us to proceed.

Your reservation was made on a discounted non-refundable rate. Because this rate is confirmed in advance, it is not eligible for refund under the booking terms.

If you would like us to proceed with cancellation, please reply to confirm and we will complete it promptly.

We know this is disappointing when plans change unexpectedly. If you have travel insurance, your provider may be able to help recover costs.

If anything is unclear, we are happy to explain each step.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-Qr5uCli0_vnTgmd9yTjLDtIDVcusGJYyCcnC_fPmf0/edit?usp=sharing>

subject: No Show
body:
Dear Guest,

We are sorry you were unable to arrive for your stay.

As check-in was not completed, the reservation has been closed as a no-show.

If you would like to stay on different dates, please send your preferred dates and we will help you rebook based on availability.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-Qr5uCli0_vnTgmd9yTjLDtIDVcusGJYyCcnC_fPmf0/edit?usp=sharing>

subject: Age Restriction
body:
Dear Guest,


Thank you for your understanding as we explain our age-related policy. We implemented this policy in response to various complaints we received concerning the atmosphere in our establishment.


Previously, we encountered situations where guests reported feeling uncomfortable due to the presence of older individuals in the dormitories. These complaints were often vague and difficult to verify, which led to challenging decisions.


Initially, we attempted to be flexible with the policy, admitting guests who assured us they were easygoing. Unfortunately, despite their assurances, some of these guests later complained about noise levels.


As a result, we have decided to adhere more strictly to our policy during peak seasons to minimize risks and maintain a comfortable environment for all our guests. During the start and end of the season, when risks are more manageable, we can be more flexible.


We acknowledge that this policy may not be ideal for everyone, but we believe it is preferable to the alternative. We appreciate your understanding and thank you for allowing us to clarify our position on this matter.


Best regards,


Peter Cowling

Owner

For full details, please see: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-Qr5uCli0_vnTgmd9yTjLDtIDVcusGJYyCcnC_fPmf0/edit?usp=sharing>

subject: Path of the Gods Hike - Recommended Routes
body:
{{SLOT:GREETING}}

We are pleased to provide you with the following suggested routes for the popular Path of the Gods hike. Each option offers unique advantages to enhance your hiking experience:


   - Via Amalfi on the ferry <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1W2SCLPgOFYSrVyaxuelQQJwACfgRwJ5HVQP6Hzs67Ic/edit?usp=sharing> - Most scenic route via Amalfi
   - Via Amalfi on the bus <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1drLc9ZhyrA86_dB-Y-_eqJdtHKphrn4NHq6Bn2h2wrk/edit?usp=sharing> - Most convenient route via Amalfi
   - Via Nocelle <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WBfYvqkyjQ-yVIXymKa0UIpTDKqftv7Zd_Ot2bpJ24E/edit?usp=sharing> - Longer walking experience with less transport time
   

We hope this information helps you in choosing the route that best suits your preferences. Should you have any questions or need further assistance, please feel free to reach out.

{{SLOT:KNOWLEDGE_INJECTION}}

Best regards,

Peter Cowling

Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/path-of-gods-hike>

subject: Prepayment Successful
body:
Dear Guest,

We are pleased to confirm that the payment transaction has been successfully processed, and your reservation is now complete.

We look forward to your arrival, and to providing you with a comfortable and enjoyable stay at our hostel.

Should you have any questions, or require further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us.

Warm regards,

Peter Cowling

Owner

subject: Breakfast — Eligibility and Hours
body:
{{SLOT:GREETING}}

Thank you for your question about breakfast.

Breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 10:30 AM. Each guest is entitled to one breakfast per day. To order, simply use the hostel ordering system and collect your breakfast within 30 minutes. Please note that breakfast is served on-site only and cannot be taken away.

If you have any dietary requirements or further questions, please let us know.

{{SLOT:KNOWLEDGE_INJECTION}}

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/booking-basics>

subject: Breakfast — Not Included (OTA Booking)
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email.

Breakfast is available exclusively for direct bookings. As your reservation was made through a third-party booking platform, breakfast is unfortunately not included in your stay.

For future stays, booking directly through our website ensures you receive all available benefits, including breakfast. You can find more details at <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/booking-basics>.

If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to ask.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Luggage Storage — Before Check-in
body:
{{SLOT:GREETING}}

Thank you for your email.

Yes, we offer free luggage storage on your arrival day. You can drop off your bags from 10:30 AM onwards. Our secure storage area will keep your belongings safe while you explore Positano before check-in.

For more details, please see our luggage storage guide: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/luggage-storage-positano>.

{{SLOT:KNOWLEDGE_INJECTION}}

We look forward to welcoming you!

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Luggage Storage — After Checkout
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email.

After checkout, you are welcome to store your luggage free of charge until 3:30 PM on your departure day. You may collect your bags at any time between 7:30 AM and 3:30 PM.

Please note that if you need to collect your luggage after 3:30 PM, our porter service is available at a cost of €15 per bag.

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/luggage-storage-positano>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Luggage Storage — Porter Service
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email.

Our standard luggage storage hours on departure day are 7:30 AM to 3:30 PM (free of charge). If you need to collect your bags after 3:30 PM, our porter service can assist you at a cost of €15 per bag.

Please let us know your expected collection time so we can arrange this for you. More information is available here: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/porter-service-positano>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/luggage-storage-positano>

subject: WiFi Information
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question.

Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the hostel from check-in to checkout. The network supports general browsing and email. Please note that streaming and high-bandwidth activities may experience limited performance, and connection speeds are not guaranteed.

You will receive the WiFi details at check-in.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Booking Change — Date Modification
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email.

Date changes are subject to availability. Please let us know your preferred new dates and we will check what options are available for you.

Please note that for non-refundable bookings, modifications may not be possible. For full details on our change and cancellation policy, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/changing-cancelling>.

We will do our best to accommodate your request.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Booking Change — Room Type
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email.

Room type changes are subject to availability and any applicable rate differences. Please let us know which room type you would prefer, and we will check what we can offer.

For more information about our booking policies, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/changing-cancelling>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Booking Extension Request
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email.

We are happy to look into extending your stay. Please note that extensions are subject to availability and our maximum stay limit of 7 nights.

Please let us know how many additional nights you would like, and we will confirm whether this is possible along with the applicable rate.

For more details: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/changing-cancelling>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Checkout Reminder
body:
{{SLOT:GREETING}}

We hope you have enjoyed your stay with us.

This is a friendly reminder that checkout is by 10:00 AM. After checkout, you are welcome to store your luggage free of charge until 3:30 PM and continue to enjoy our bar, terrace, and facilities.

Please return your keycard at reception to receive your €10 deposit refund.

For full checkout details: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/checkin-checkout>.

{{SLOT:KNOWLEDGE_INJECTION}}

We wish you safe onward travels!

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Late Checkout Request
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email.

Late checkout is available until 12:00 PM at a cost of €40, subject to availability. Standard checkout time is 10:00 AM.

Please let us know if you would like to request late checkout and we will confirm availability for your departure date.

For more details about check-in and checkout: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/checkin-checkout>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Quiet Hours Reminder
body:
Dear Guest,

We hope you are enjoying your stay.

This is a friendly reminder that quiet hours are in effect from 11:45 PM to 8:00 AM. During this time, we kindly ask all guests to keep noise to a minimum in rooms, hallways, and common areas out of respect for fellow guests.

Please note that repeated disturbances may result in further action. Our full house rules can be found here: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/rules>.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Visitor Policy
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about visitors.

Visitors are welcome in our communal areas between 10:30 AM and 11:00 PM. All visitors must present a valid photo ID at reception upon arrival. Please note that visitors are not permitted in guest rooms or dormitories.

For our complete house rules, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/rules>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Deposit and Keycard Info
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question.

At check-in, we collect a €10 refundable deposit which covers your keycard and linen. This deposit is returned to you at checkout when you hand back your keycard at reception.

The city tax is also collected at check-in, as required by local regulations.

For full details on the check-in process: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/checkin-checkout>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Coupon Code Redemption
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for booking with us and for sharing your coupon code.

We have applied the discount to your reservation. You will see this reflected in your booking details. No further action is needed on your part.

We appreciate you booking directly with us, and we look forward to welcoming you to the hostel!

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Job Application — Acknowledgement
body:
Dear Applicant,

Thank you for your interest in joining the Hostel Brikette team.

We have received your application and will review it along with other candidates. If your profile matches our current needs, we will be in touch to arrange an interview.

Please note that we typically recruit for the upcoming season between January and March. If you do not hear from us within a few weeks, we encourage you to apply again for future seasons.

We wish you all the best.

Best regards,

Hostel Brikette, Positano

subject: Lost Item — Report Received
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for getting in touch about your lost item.

We will check the room and our lost property storage. To help us locate your item, please confirm:

   - A description of the item
   - The room number you stayed in
   - Your checkout date

If we find the item, we can arrange to hold it for collection or discuss shipping options. Please note that shipping costs would be at the guest's expense.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Booking Inquiry — Availability
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your message.

For live availability and pricing, please use our direct booking page:
https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/booking-basics\r\n\r\nThat page always shows the most up-to-date room options and rates.

If you send us your dates and room preference, we can also point you to the most suitable option.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Room Capacity Clarification
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question.

Our dorm rooms have multiple beds, and each booking is for one bed per guest. If you are travelling as a group, each member will need their own booking for a bed in the room.

For groups wanting a private space, we offer private rooms that accommodate 2 guests. These are subject to availability.

Please check our website for live availability: <https://hostel-positano.com/>. If you have any further questions about room types, please let us know.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/booking-basics>

subject: Hostel Facilities and Services
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about our facilities.

At Hostel Brikette we offer:

   - Complimentary WiFi throughout the property
   - Free luggage storage on arrival and departure days
   - A bar and terrace with views over Positano
   - Breakfast for direct bookings (8:00–10:30 AM)
   - A digital assistant for local tips and travel information

Please note that we do not currently offer on-site laundry facilities.

For a full overview of everything available, visit our assistance page: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Cancellation Request — Medical Hardship
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for explaining the situation, and we are very sorry to hear about your emergency.

We understand this is a difficult moment.

For bookings on a non-refundable rate, the payment terms still apply and we cannot issue a refund directly.

If you have travel insurance, we recommend submitting a claim as soon as possible, and we can provide supporting booking documentation on request.

If you would like us to proceed with cancellation immediately, reply to confirm and we will process it promptly.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-Qr5uCli0_vnTgmd9yTjLDtIDVcusGJYyCcnC_fPmf0/edit?usp=sharing>

subject: Cancellation Confirmation
body:
Dear Guest,

We have received your cancellation request and can confirm your reservation has been cancelled.

If you made your booking through a third-party platform (such as Hostelworld or Booking.com), please refer to that platform's cancellation policy regarding any refunds.

For direct bookings, the refund terms depend on the rate selected at the time of booking. If you have questions about your specific case, please reply to this email.

We hope to welcome you to the hostel in the future.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Payment Dispute — Acknowledgement
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your message. We understand your concern and we are reviewing this with priority.

To complete the review quickly, please reply with your booking reference, payment date, and the last 4 digits of the card used.

Once we verify the payment trail, we will send a clear written response with next steps.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-Qr5uCli0_vnTgmd9yTjLDtIDVcusGJYyCcnC_fPmf0/edit?usp=sharing>

subject: Overbooking Support — Next Steps
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your patience, and we are sorry for the inconvenience.

We are reviewing your booking status urgently and will confirm the final accommodation plan shortly.

If your original room cannot be honored, we will provide clear next steps, including relocation or cancellation options based on policy.

Please share the best phone number for urgent contact while we finalize this.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/changing-cancelling>

subject: Bar and Terrace — Hours and Access
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about our bar and terrace.

Our bar and terrace are open daily and are available to all guests from 10:30 AM. They are a great place to relax, enjoy a drink, and take in the views over Positano.

Guests are welcome to use the bar and terrace both before check-in (from 10:30 AM on arrival day) and after checkout (until 3:30 PM on departure day).

Please note that only drinks purchased at the hostel bar may be consumed on the terrace, in line with our licensed premises policy.

For more information about our facilities, please visit: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Parking — Not Available, Nearby Options
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about parking.

Unfortunately, Hostel Brikette does not have on-site parking and we are unable to reserve parking spaces on your behalf. Positano is a pedestrian-priority town and private car access to the centre is restricted, particularly during peak season.

Some options guests use:

   - Public car parks are available at the entrances to Positano (e.g. Piazza dei Mulini and Via Cristoforo Colombo). These operate on a pay-and-display basis and spaces fill quickly in summer.
   - A number of guests prefer to travel by ferry, bus, or taxi to avoid the parking challenge entirely.

For travel directions to the hostel, including ferry and bus options, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/travel-help>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Pets — Policy
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about bringing a pet.

We are sorry, but Hostel Brikette does not permit pets on the premises. This policy applies to all guest rooms and communal areas, and is in place to protect the comfort and wellbeing of all guests, including those with allergies.

We appreciate your understanding.

If you have any other questions about your stay, please do not hesitate to ask.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-Qr5uCli0_vnTgmd9yTjLDtIDVcusGJYyCcnC_fPmf0/edit?usp=sharing>

subject: City Tax — What to Expect at Check-in
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about the city tax.

The city tax (tassa di soggiorno) is a local government levy collected at check-in, as required by Italian law. It is not included in the room rate and must be paid in person at the hostel.

The amount varies depending on the municipality's current rate and your length of stay. Our team will confirm the exact amount when you arrive.

Please note that payment is required at check-in along with the €10 refundable keycard deposit.

For full details on the check-in process, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/checkin-checkout>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Private Room vs Dormitory — Comparison
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about our room types.

Here is a quick comparison to help you choose:

*Private Rooms*

   - Accommodates 2 guests
   - Exclusive use of the room
   - Ideal for couples or guests who prefer more privacy
   - Subject to availability

*Dormitory Rooms*

   - Shared rooms with multiple beds
   - Each booking is for one bed
   - Great for solo travellers and those looking to meet other guests
   - Our most affordable option

Both room types include access to all hostel facilities: bar, terrace, WiFi, and luggage storage.

For live availability and pricing for both options, please visit: <https://hostel-positano.com/>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/booking-basics>

subject: Things to Do in Positano
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about activities in Positano.

Positano and the Amalfi Coast have a huge amount to offer. Here are some of our top recommendations:

   - Path of the Gods hike — our most popular recommendation. See our guide: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/path-of-gods-hike>
   - Ferry trips to Amalfi, Ravello, and Capri
   - The beaches of Positano (Spiaggia Grande and Fornillo)
   - Exploring the village, shops, and restaurants
   - Boat hire and coastal excursions

For a full set of local tips and travel guides, please visit our digital assistant: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance>.

We are always happy to give personal recommendations at the hostel — just ask at reception!

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Receipt / Invoice Request
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your email.

We are happy to provide a receipt or invoice for your stay. Please reply with the following details so we can process this for you:

   - Your full name (or company name if a business invoice is required)
   - Your booking reference or dates of stay
   - The billing address and, if applicable, your VAT number

We will send the document to the email address associated with your booking.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Group Booking — How It Works
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your interest in a group booking at Hostel Brikette.

For groups, here is how the booking process works:

   - Each guest books individually for their own bed in a shared dormitory room, or you can request a private room (accommodates 2 guests) if available.
   - For groups of 3 or more, we recommend contacting us directly so we can check current availability and advise on the best room configuration.
   - Please note our maximum stay is 7 nights and our rooms accommodate up to 5 guests per room.

To check live availability, please visit: <https://hostel-positano.com/>.

If you would like to discuss a group arrangement further, please reply with your group size, preferred dates, and any specific requirements.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

For full details, please see: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/booking-basics>

subject: Out of Hours Check-In Instructions
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for letting us know you will be arriving late.

For arrivals after 10:30 PM, we have a self-check-in process in place. Please follow the step-by-step instructions in our late check-in guide: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/late-checkin>.

The guide covers:

   - How to access the building after hours
   - Locating your room
   - What to do if you have any difficulty

If you have any questions or need assistance on the night, the emergency contact details are included in the guide.

We look forward to welcoming you!

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner

subject: Arriving by Bus
body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for your question about arriving by bus.

Positano is well connected by bus from Naples, Sorrento, and along the Amalfi Coast. The SITA Sud bus service runs regularly during the season.

For step-by-step instructions on arriving by bus, including stop locations and walking directions to the hostel, please see our arriving by bus guide: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/arriving-by-bus>.

If you are travelling from Naples or Sorrento, we also have a general travel directions guide here: <https://hostel-positano.com/en/assistance/travel-help>.

Best regards,

Peter Cowling
Owner
